string-array.name: question_arrays
string-array.item: Where is the archive for this lesson?
Who should judge GB for such an android development program?
How to pass an interview after such a course in Android development?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: Forgot to prepare a program for android development!
You don\'t see it, but they are there! Like a gopher in DMB.
A well-drafted contract allows you to do such crazy things!
Why should we pass an interview? After that course we will be very high value employees!
